info.name: JIRA API Testing with Postman
info.description:
## Overview

This repository contains a Postman collection for testing the JIRA API, specifically focusing on the comments functionality. The tests are designed to validate various response codes and ensure the correct behavior of different endpoints.

## API Documentation

For detailed information about the JIRA API and the endpoints tested in this collection, please refer to the official API documentation: [JIRA API Documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/rest/v2/api-group-issue-comments/#api-group-issue-comments).

## Features

- Automated validation of response codes (success, unauthorized, not found, error).
    
- Testing of GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE endpoints related to comments.
    

## Getting Started

1. Import the Postman collection from this repository into Postman.
    
2. Set up the necessary environment variables and authentication details as specified in the collection.
    
3. Run the tests to validate the JIRA comments endpoints.
    

## Running the Tests

1. Open Postman and select the imported collection.
    
2. Configure the environment with your JIRA instance details.
    
3. Execute the requests and review the results to verify the functionality of the API endpoints.
    

## Author
